Property.name: UnusedToys
Property.HelpText: Brings back the toys Piano and Organ for Hero Garden and Dark Garden. Along with Rattles alignment!

Property.name: NewInventory
Property.HelpText: The Inventory will shows actual items instead of just icons.

Property.name: ToyMove
Property.HelpText: Enable being able to pickup toys and save their current position.

Property.name: GardenMagnitude
Property.HelpText: The Hero Garden and Dark Garden won't affect the Chao's magnitude and alignment.

Property.name: EggColor
Property.HelpText: The Egg Colors change based on the Chao's Shininess and Colors.

Property.name: PlayerSpeed
Property.HelpText: Tails and Metal Sonic speed are better adjusted now for the Chao World.

Property.name: BirthdayEvent
Property.HelpText: A Chao can throw Birthday parties! Everyone will join to celebrate and eat some Cakes.

Property.name: SpawnOmochao
Property.HelpText: Option to disable the omochao building if you don't want to see it anymore

Property.name: OmochaoParts
Property.HelpText: Animal Parts appear on Omochao.

Property.name: FruitRebalance
Property.HelpText: Rebalances the stats of all vanilla fruits.

Property.name: DayNightCycle
Property.HelpText: Time passes in the gardens with slight weather changes (Warning: May not be compatible with some Texture mods)

Property.name: DayNightCheat
Property.HelpText: Lets you edit the current time by pressing X+Y (Note: It pauses passing time)

Property.name: NoDayNightTransition
Property.HelpText: Disables the transition between time changes

Property.name: AdvancedChaosandCharactersChaoarelikeNormalChao
Property.display: Rare Chao act like Normal Chao
Property.HelpText: Gives Chaos and Character Chao the ability to have animal parts and breed. Also allow Chaos Chao to hav expression!

Property.name: AdvancedMedalChaocanmakeJewelChao
Property.HelpText: When breeding, Chao with medals from races could produce a Jewel Chao corresponding with the medal they’re wearing.

Property.name: AdvancedCreateNEWShinyJewelMonotone
Property.HelpText: Enable the ability to get the new Shiny Jewel Monotones. If a Shiny Monotone breeds with a Jewel Chao you may get one. This does not overwrite regular Shiny Jewels, which can still be gotten by breeding a Shiny Two-tone with a Jewel.

Property.name: AdvancedMixingColors
Property.HelpText: Enables new Mixed Color chao. If two colored Chao breed, the newborn Chao’s color would be a mix of both parents instead of the color of just one.

Property.name: AdvancedNewbornChaoHaveVaryingShadesofColor
Property.HelpText: The Next Color Chao from the Black Market will be born with varying shades of the original color (including the original color itself).

Property.name: AdvancedNormalChaocanmakeColorChao
Property.display: Normal Chao can make Color Chao
Property.HelpText: A Chao with the normal default color can make a colored Chao based of the Evolution when breeding, if its stat influence is High enough. If a Chao has a Monster Evolution, the newborn could also be transparent!

Property.name: AdvancedEyeColorsforNewbornChao
Property.HelpText: Newborn Chao could be born with more shades of eye colors than the default dark blue

Property.name: EnableMonsterEvolution
Property.HelpText: Allows Chao to gain a higher magnitude in stat influence once the stat is above 2000 points.

Property.name: FixMonsterEvo
Property.HelpText: Fixes monster evolved chao turning transparent.

Property.name: AdvancedFruitscanSpoilt
Property.HelpText: If left out long enough, fruit may spoil. Feeding a spoiled fruit to your Chao will decrease its Magnitude and Stamina.

Property.name: AdvancedTransformPCShinyJewelsintoGCShinyJewels
Property.display: Transform PC Shiny Jewels into GC Shiny Jewels
Property.HelpText: "Restores" the way Shiny Jewel Chao look to the GameCube Shiny Jewels. (/!\ Require Chao Backup, this cannot be undo after save /!\)

Property.name: HardBullyChaoRequiresMoreChaoAnimations
Property.HelpText: If a Chao gets angry or upset it may choose a Chao to attack. Requires “More Chao Animations” turned on to work.

Property.name: ChaoDrown
Property.HelpText: If the Chao can't swim, they will slowly lose Happiness, and if it reaches -100, they Drown.

Property.name: HardEnableSpinDashandSomersault
Property.HelpText: Enables Spindash and Somersault in the Chao Gardens. Be careful, you could hurt your Chao!

Property.name: ChaoHunger
Property.HelpText: When Chao are Starving, they will start Crying, being Angry, and losing happiness. This also Boost Stamina by 25% for Fruit Garden.

Property.name: HardChaoAttention
Property.HelpText: Chao will lose happiness if you don’t give them attention for a while.

Property.name: HardAnnoyingMeanChao
Property.HelpText: Chao with Mean Eyes will slowy hate all Characters, which will make them harder to deal with, espescially with Bully Chao turned on.

Property.name: ChaoSick
Property.HelpText: Increase the Chance of your Chao getting Sick. Does nothing much but go Heal your Chao and make the Doctor do his job.

Property.name: EmotionDisplay
Property.HelpText: Icons show up next to Chao that display if they're Hungry, Sad, Sick, Etc

Property.name: EasyFruitsNeverDespawn
Property.HelpText: Instead of disappearing after a while, Fruits will stay in the Garden indefinitely.

Property.name: AnimalReuse
Property.HelpText: Animals are reusable without doing the glitch.

Property.name: EasyReusableChaosDrive
Property.HelpText: Chaos Drives are reusable without doing the glitch.

Property.name: EasyInstantGrowTrees
Property.HelpText: Trees grow to their full size immediately after the seed is planted.

Property.name: EasyInstantGrowFruits
Property.HelpText: Fruits grow to their full size immediately from the Trees.

Property.name: EasyChaocan'thateCharacters
Property.HelpText: A Chao’s bond with a character will never drop below 0.

Property.name: EasyAutoGenerateStats
Property.HelpText: A Chao’s stats will increase on its own through its lifetime until level 10.

Property.name: EasyStrongerChaosDrive
Property.HelpText: Chaos Drives will give Chao more points toward their stats.

Property.name: EasyReincarnationRequires20Happiness
Property.HelpText: Chao only need 20 Happiness to Reincarnate instead of die. Pretty useful if you wanna try Hard Code.

Property.name: DisableReincarnation
Property.HelpText: Disables natural reincarnation.

Property.name: SaveMultiSavefile
Property.HelpText: Each SA2 save also includes its own Chao World file instead of using one file universally.

Property.name: BonusChaoCounter
Property.HelpText: Adds a Chao Counter on the screen when paused to see how many Chao are in the garden.

Property.name: KeepAnimalParts
Property.HelpText: Prevents Chao from getting any new animal parts.

Property.name: DisableBreed
Property.HelpText: Prevents Chao from breeding.

Property.name: OtherDisableAnimalPartsArmslegs
Property.HelpText: Chao will not keep animal parts on their arms and legs. Chao can still have other animal parts such as ears, wings, and tails.

Property.name: OtherDisableAnimalPartsALL
Property.HelpText: Chao will not keep any animal parts.

Property.name: AdvancedDynamicLifetime
Property.HelpText: The rate at which Chao will grow, evolve, and reincarnate depends on how many Chao are in the garden. Less Chao per garden makes them grow faster.

Property.name: BonusLuckyChao
Property.HelpText: Gives a 1/60 chance that Chao will be born with a Hat, Toy, or Lesson.

Property.name: BonusStayBabyChaoUntilalllvl.10
Property.HelpText: A Baby Chao will not evolve unless all the stats reach level 10, or Stamina reaches level 99.

Property.name: BonusMergeHeroandDarkGardenChaoSlots
Property.display: Merge Hero and Dark Garden Chao Slots
Property.HelpText: The same Chao will appear in both the Hero and Dark Gardens. Up to 16 Chao can be in the Hero and Dark Gardens.

Property.name: GardenLimit
Property.HelpText: Increase the number of chao you want to be in the Garden, from 8 to 24. Reminder that it will NOT increase the number of chao you can get per save.

Property.name: PersonalityMultiply
Property.HelpText: Multiply the Personality Effect, this affect the Chao Emotions and Behaviors, can make a Garden extremely active.

Property.name: OtherSADXChaoAlignment
Property.HelpText: A Chao’s hero/dark alignment can only be changed with Hero and Dark fruits like in SADX.

Property.name: OtherMoreandRandomChaoFace
Property.HelpText: Adds lots of new random face combinations for newborn Chao. Also restores some unused mouths.

Property.name: OtherRemoveDarkChao'sMeanEyesOverride
Property.display: Remove Dark Chao's Mean Eyes Override
Property.HelpText: A Chao evolving into a Dark Chao will keep its original eyes instead of being overwritten with the classic Dark Chao Mean Eyes.

Property.name: ForceShinyTT
Property.HelpText: Turns all Bright Chao into Shiny Twotone. (disabling this code will return them to their original look)

Property.name: DisableLevelupJingle
Property.HelpText: Disables the level up sound effect (original code by Buster).

Property.name: HDToyModels
Property.HelpText: HD Chao Toys from the Sega Superstars Chao Minigame.

Property.name: BlackMarketShort
Property.HelpText: Less dialog in Black Market.

Property.name: DetailFittingPersonality
Property.HelpText: Personalities are tied to more Chao Faces.

Property.name: DetailDoctorChaogivemoreInformationEN
Property.HelpText: Adds more things for the Chao Doctor to say. (English only)

Property.name: MoreAnimation
Property.HelpText: Bring and Restore Unused Animations to the game, bring some new Behavior to Chao, and give them more Expression

Property.name: ClassroomTimerDisplay
Property.HelpText: Shows how much time until lesson rerolls, and when your chao will finish their lesson.

Property.name: MoreSound
Property.HelpText: Restores unused sounds and sounds from SADX. Chao make more sounds while doing actions.

Property.name: HDHoodie
Property.HelpText: Hoodie models are higher poly.

Property.name: DCCocoon
Property.HelpText: Cocoons behave as they do in the DC version (all cocoons are grey).

Property.name: ControllerOnlyBetterCameraControl
Property.HelpText: Use the D-Pad and C Stick to have better control of the camera in the Chao Garden. Use L+R to reset the camera back to default.

Property.name: KeyboardwithNumpadBetterCameraControl
Property.HelpText: Use the Keyboard numpad (-, +, *, Page Up, Page Down, Home, End) to have better control of the camera in the Chao Garden. Use / to reset the camera back to default.

Property.name: KeyboardwithoutNumpadBetterCameraControl
Property.HelpText: Use the Keyboard numpad (-, +, *, R, F, T, G) to have better control of the camera in the Chao Garden. Use BackSpace to reset the camera back to default.

Property.name: SaveHoldXtoLoadNegativeChaoSave
Property.display: Hold X to Load Negative Chao Save
Property.HelpText: Hold down X (or Blue Input for Keyboard) while Chao World is loading to load an alternate save file in which Chao have opposite textures (i.e. Hero Chao are dark colored and Dark Chao are light colored).

Property.name: BonusChaoKarategiveMedal
Property.HelpText: Winning a Karate match will give the Chao a medal. Uses some of the SADX exclusive medals.

Property.name: RaceJewelandBeginnerRacebecome8PPartyRace
Property.display: Jewel and Beginner Race become 8P Party Race
Property.HelpText: The Jewel Race and Beginner Race will pit the first 8 Chao in your file against each other in an 8-way Party Race. Also block the ability to Boost.

Property.name: RaceCameraswitchManuallyusingkeyboard
Property.HelpText: Use numbers 1-8 on the keyboard to switch to the perspective of any chao in the Chao Race.

Property.name: RaceWinJewelChaoinJewelRace
Property.display: Win Jewel Chao in Jewel Race
Property.HelpText: Winning the 5th level of a Jewel Race will reward you with a Jewel Chao.

Property.name: RaceChaoGainExpatChaoRace
Property.display: Chao Gain Exp at Chao Race
Property.HelpText: Chao will slowly gain stat points while in a race.

Property.name: JackInBoxPunishment
Property.HelpText: Reduces Jack in the Box punishment from ~8 seconds to ~3 seconds

Property.name: IgnoreMinigameIntel
Property.HelpText: Chao will ignore the intelligence minigame.

Property.name: ToyReset
Property.HelpText: Press X+A+L outside of the gardens to reset the toys to their default position.

Property.name: CheatBlackMarket
Property.HelpText: Use X+Y (or Yellow Input and Blue Input for Keyboard) in the Black Market to activate the Debug Menu.

Property.name: CheatDisableLevelLimit
Property.HelpText: A Chao’s stat can be leveled up infinitely, instead of capping at 99.
